## SECONDARY\_HOST\_ADDRESS variable

Host name used to access the metadata server. Defaults to 'http://metadata.google.internal.'.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
SECONDARY_HOST_ADDRESS = "http://metadata.google.internal."
```
